REPORT.name: Сегментирование
REPORT.description: Отчет показывает распределение количество сеансов по суммам --- Author: NodaSoft support@nodasoft.com
REPORT.code: set nocount on declare @count int set @count = 0 if object_id('tempdb..#tseg') is not null DROP TABLE #tseg CREATE TABLE #tseg ( [id] [int] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (255) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL , [result] [int] ) ON [PRIMARY] select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>0 and CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay<=5 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'От 0 до 5 рублей', @count ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>5 and CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay<=10 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'От 5 до 10 рублей', @count ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>10 and CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay<=20 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'От 10 до 20 рублей', @count ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>20 and CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay<=40 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'От 20 до 40 рублей', @count ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>40 and CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay<=70 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'От 40 до 70 рублей', @count ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>70 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'Более 70 рублей', @count ) INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'------------------', 0 ) select @count=count(id) from Sessions where CommonPay + SeparateTrafficPay>0 and %TIME-START%<=started and started<%TIME-STOP% INSERT INTO #tseg (name,result) VALUES (N'Итого сеансов', @count ) SELECT name [Оплата сеанса], result [Сумма] FROM #tseg order by [id] asc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
